title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 390.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 390.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

This Part establishes the requirements for county and
municipal agricultural and farmland protection plans, the procedures for
development and approval of such plans and the application process for planning
grants to assist counties and municipalities in the development of such
plans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
390.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
